column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Food - we had a seafood tower as an appetizer. Lobster
column3: and oysters. All fantastic. We had crab stuffed avocado...YUM. Sides - pommes frites and creamed spinach and thick cut bacon. Again
column4: YUM. My friend and I both had the petite filet. My husband had the dry aged bone in rib eye. My friend's husband had the Pork Chop. All good was fantastic. I'm not sure I would change a thing.
